circle.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 4px;

path.style: fill: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round;
fill: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round;
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgb(2, 1, 1); fill-opacity: 0; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 8px;
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); fill-opacity: 0; stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round;
fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); fill-opacity: 0; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round;
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 10px; fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round;
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0);
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round;
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round;
